name: 玛丽亚·多耶·肯尼迪 Maria Doyle Kennedy
intro: Maria Doyle Kennedy (born Maria Josephine Doyle; 25 September 1964) is an award-winning Irish actress and singer. As an actress she is possibly best known for her roles as Queen Katherine of Aragon in the award winning The Tudors and as the title character's wife Frances in The General.
birthplace: 爱尔兰,都柏林,克伦塔夫
